infos.descriptionHTML: KCUS implemented and maintains GoTime, the Massachusetts Statewide Real Time Traffic Management (RTTM) System.
KCUS is working with the Massachusetts DOT to design and implement a new Integrated Transportation Management System (ITMS).
KCUS is currently designing and developing a Truck Appointment System (TAS) Application for Beirut Container Terminal Consoritum (BCTC).
